AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.resumeText: Full Stack Developer with experience in creating scalable web and mobile solutions using React, React Native, and Node.js (NestJS). I am a proactive professional, highly capable of learning and adapting to new technologies and challenges in both backend and frontend. Focused on developing products that generate positive impact and improve user experience, working collaboratively in agile environments.

ExperienceSection.title: Professional Experience
ExperienceSection.gazin_achieve1: Development of scalable credit analysis/collection system (NestJS/React).
ExperienceSection.gazin_achieve3: Work with and consumption of RESTful APIs.
ExperienceSection.rom_achieve1: Development and maintenance of internal web applications (React/Node.js).
ExperienceSection.rom_achieve2: Customization and development on the Salesforce platform (Apex).
ExperienceSection.rom_achieve3: Maintenance and modernization of legacy systems.

EducationSection.title: Education & Certificates
EducationSection.extra_english_detail: Full proficiency in the language, focused on technical conversation.
EducationSection.extra_fullstack_detail: Courses and immersion events covering HTML, CSS, JS, TS, React, Node.js, Next.js, and NestJS.
